description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.title: General Counters, CPU, Memory and Replication lag

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

panels.description: Lag in bytes between master and slave
panels.title: Replication lag (mb)

panels.description: Replication lag behind primary in seconds, as detected after a roundtrip on the primary.
panels.title: Replication lag (seconds)

targets.expr: sum by(datname,state) (pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)", job=~"$namespace"})

pg_stat_database_blks_hit{instance="$instance", datname=~"$datname", job=~"$namespace"} / (pg_stat_database_blks_read{instance="$instance", datname=~"$datname", job=~"$namespace"} + pg_stat_database_blks_hit{instance="$instance", datname=~"$datname", job=~"$namespace"})

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

title: PostgreSQL Database mult
